ecologie.title: How are garbage treated in Switzerland?
ecologie.txt:
In Switzerland, much of the waste is recycled. Containers for glass, plastic, metal and paper are almost everywhere. These are all valuable raw materials that can be transformed into many new products. For example, new paper can be made from old newspapers.

What can be thrown into a biocontent?

In some places, biological decrees such as fruit remnants and Vegetables can also be thrown into special containers. This biological waste then returns to the land. But beware: the remains of cooked meals, dairy products and meat should not be thrown into the biocontent!

It is therefore necessary to examine exactly the garbage before deciding on its destination. Please contact neighbors or concierges beforehand. Garbage sorting is an essential component of protecting the environment. The recycling of garbage is also an economic branch which guarantees many jobs.
